example.eg: The majority of people don't really care about the rest of the world.
example.egtrans: 多数人不怎么关心世界上其他地方的情况。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多数派, 多数党, 多数

example.eg: The referendum was to be decided by a simple majority.
example.egtrans: 公投通过单纯表决法来决定。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多数, 大部分, 大部分

example.eg: The Labour party won the majority in the last election.
The teenage criminals were sentenced lightly because they hadn't reached majority yet.
Ted's grandmother went to join the majority last night.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 过世的人, 去世的人

example.eg: The officer was promoted to majority for his exemplary service.
The party won the election by an absolute majority.

dsense.name: by a majority
dsense.guideword: (by most people, by more than half)

example.eg: They were able to pass their laws by a majority vote of 51 to 49.
Single women are in the majority at the company I work for.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 大多数的, 大部分的

example.eg: In the majority of shops, credit cards are an acceptable method of payment.
The silent majority has no agenda, no power base, and no direction.
A simple majority is all that is needed to pass the legislation.
The United States Bill of Rights was written to protect citizens from a tyranny of the majority.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多数暴政, 多数人的暴政, 多数派的专制
